page.title: 12HEALTH IN SALPERTON
page.content: The nearest doctors' surgeries are at Andoversford,Northleach and Bourton-on-the-Water (3.5,6.5 and 7.5 miles from Salperton respectively). They are part of two rural practices and the doctors travel many miles to these and other surgeries in the county.Those needing further treatment are referred to consultants at Cheltenham and Bourton General Hospitals.There is an ambulance service covering the area,and the North Cotswold Voluntary Help Bureau at Moreton-in-the-Marsh organises a team of voluntary drivers who use their own cars to take patients to hospital appointments,etc,in exchange for running expenses.
